message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Mid- and small-caps showed risk-on tone led by hospitals (FORTIS, MAXHEALTH, ASTERDM), exchanges/depositories (BSE, CDSL), and select IT (PERSISTENT, MPHASIS, COFORGE). PSU banks were softer; metals/mid infra were mixed. Our book is slightly green overall with HINDCOPPER leading and ASHOKLEY/LTF soft. Into Monday, favor strength continuation in healthcare, market infra (BSE/CDSL), and high-RS financials; avoid fresh buys in names showing supply bars (POONAWALLA, AEGISLOG).",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "CDSL", "signal": "Buy on strength/dips", "reason": "High-volume range breakout; closes near high and above 1,520 resistance; strong market-infra tailwind", "price": 1524.90},
    {"symbol": "FORTIS", "signal": "Buy above 1060", "reason": "Momentum continuation in hospitals; strong close near day high with elevated volume", "price": 1053.90},
    {"symbol": "MAXHEALTH", "signal": "Buy on dips toward 1115-1125", "reason": "Sector leadership; orderly uptrend with strong close", "price": 1139.70},
    {"symbol": "NYKAA", "signal": "Buy on strength >257 or pullback to 248-252", "reason": "Big volume expansion; breakout attempt with close near high", "price": 255.34},
    {"symbol": "BSE", "signal": "Buy above 2225", "reason": "Fresh-high attempt; sustained momentum in exchange stocks", "price": 2217.90},
    {"symbol": "CHOLAFIN", "signal": "Momentum long >1665 or buy dips ~1600", "reason": "Wide-range day with volume, relative strength in NBFCs", "price": 1634.10},
    {"symbol": "DELHIVERY", "signal": "Buy above 465", "reason": "Gap-and-go day with strong close; potential continuation if clears intraday high", "price": 462.60},
    {"symbol": "EMCURE", "signal": "Buy above 1449", "reason": "High-volume thrust and close near highs; strong pharma tone", "price": 1435.30},
    {"symbol": "POLYCAB", "signal": "Buy on dips", "reason": "All-time-high zone with constructive close; cables/electricals strong", "price": 7615.50},
    {"symbol": "KAYNES", "signal": "Buy above 7650", "reason": "Volatility contraction with breakout attempt; strong close", "price": 7466.50},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Trail SL to 329; hold", "reason": "Copper theme remains constructive; protect gains under recent swing low", "price": 337.95},
    {"symbol": "AEGISLOG", "signal": "Avoid/Short only below 825", "reason": "Bearish large red day with volume and close near low; risk of breakdown", "price": 831.00},
    {"symbol": "POONAWALLA", "signal": "Wait for stability", "reason": "Wide range with long upper wick and heavy volume suggests supply; avoid fresh longs now", "price": 531.45}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "ASHOKLEY", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Cut if key support fails; protect capital on accelerating downside", "quantity": 70, "price": 134.90},
    {"symbol": "LTF", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Break of 252 support invalidates setup; exit to avoid deeper drawdown", "quantity": 15, "price": 251.50}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 287.85,
    "total_value": 25585.25,
    "holdings_count": 5,
    "holdings": [
      "ASHOKLEY: 70 @142.00 (C 137.78)",
      "HINDCOPPER: 25 @312.00 (C 337.95)",
      "LTF: 15 @262.33 (C 259.87)",
      "BEL: 8 @412.65 (C 413.25)",
      "Cash: ₹287.85"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Hospitals strong: FORTIS, MAXHEALTH, ASTERDM closed near highs with volume; consider basket exposure Monday on dips.",
    "Market infra: BSE near fresh highs; CDSL broke above ~1520 with volume; MCX firm—theme remains strong.",
    "IT bounce: PERSISTENT, MPHASIS, COFORGE advancing; watch for follow-through above today’s highs.",
    "PSU banks mixed-to-soft: UNIONBANK, INDIANB eased; private niche lenders (CHOLAFIN) showed RS.",
    "Metals mixed: HINDCOPPER strong; SAIL softer; monitor copper complex for follow-through.",
    "Logistics/ecom: DELHIVERY strength; IRCTC steady; AEGISLOG weak—avoid for now.",
    "Consumers/retail: NYKAA strong momentum; TRENT volatile and off highs; DABUR/MARICO stable.",
    "Defence/shipyards: HAL, MAZDOCK firm; GRSE constructive—trend intact.",
    "Renewables/energy: WAAREEENER steady; KPIGREEN weak; INOXWIND cooled—favor quality over high beta.",
    "Pharma/diagnostics: EMCURE, ZYDUSLIFE firm; METROPOLIS, LALPATHLAB rallied—sector breadth improving.",
    "Realty: OBEROIRLTY strong close; PRESTIGE steady—monitor for Monday entries on strength.",
    "Chemicals: SRF flat; DEEPAKNTR/NAVINFLUOR soft—prefer wait for strength signals.",
    "Our holdings: ASHOKLEY near support—only add back above 140.5; LTF needs >264 to regain momentum; BEL steady above 410; trail HINDCOPPER to 329.",
    "PAYTM had strong day but remains event-prone; treat as tactical only above 1230 with tight risk.",
    "Risk plan: If stops in ASHOKLEY/LTF trigger, recycle capital into Monday leaders (CDSL/BSE/hospitals) on constructive tape."
  ]
}
